title: Novaflight Volleyball Shoes
subtitle: Men's Volleyball
description:
Reach for the skies but love where you live. These Novaflight indoor shoes are made in part with recycled materials, reflecting adidas' ambition to help end plastic waste. Their flexible Bounce midsole is specially shaped for explosive jumps. The lightweight, mesh upper has supportive panels that keep you locked in for the ride. Rounded edges on the outsole support natural movement when you're on the deck.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Lace closure; Mesh upper; Midfoot lockdown system; Sculpted midsole; Bounce midsole; 360-degree radius outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Grey Five; Product code: GX1264
colors: Cloud White / Core Black / Beam Orange

Take on the outdoors with ease. The adidas TERREX Free Hiker 2 GORE-TEX brings comfort and confidence to your everyday adventure. It's time to enjoy your outdoor experience. 

Take on the outdoors in style and comfort with the TERREX Free Hiker 2 GORE-TEX. Feel confident in most weather conditions thanks to the breathable GORE-TEX membrane and Continental™ rubber outsole. Enjoy your hikes with the updated design.

title: Superstar Ayoon Shoes
subtitle: Women's Originals

Always be comfortable. These adidas slides keep your feet happy from the pool deck to the locker room to the couch and everywhere in-between. description:
These juniors' adidas Superstar shoes stay true to the iconic silhouette while adding the timeless appeal of beaded friendship bracelets. These shoes can take you everywhere, thanks to BOOST midsole cushioning, a grippy rubber outsole and a stretchy knit upper that hugs your feet for comfort on the go.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

description:
The 2022 adidas X Kris Andrew Small Pride Collection was inspired by the Stonewall Activists of the Stonewall Uprising in 1969. Together adidas and Kris Andrew Small offer a collection in solidarity & celebration of the LGBTQIA+ community's past & present, honouring unique belonging – creating a  colourful & diverse graphic message among this inclusive & optimistic collection. This partnership is also adjacent to adidas' two key Global Purpose Partners, Athlete Ally & Stonewall UK.

Pride isn't just a month. It's every moment. Stand tall and celebrate it in these adidas Forum shoes. Their triple-stacked platform outsole elevates the icon to greater heights while colour accents and reflective panels flaunt hard-to-miss style.

description:
Lightweight and comfortable, the Terrex Speed Ultra is packed with innovations that give athletes an edge. Tom Evans tested different versions of the shoe for two years and helped us craft it to completion. He then took it for a spin and won the Tarawera race wearing it. He thinks it's magic, but it's just skill paired with science. 

This shoe brings together many innovations to support you on your journey. Inspired by gravel bikes, the lug pattern of the outsole offers great traction. Combining two types of lightweight materials, the midsole cushions feet and gives energy back without compromising on stability. The tongue and heel tabs are padded for comfort and the upper is light, breathable and drainage-ready.
details: Lace closure; Mesh upper with abrasion-resistant weldings; BOOST midsole and Lightstrike cushioning; Reflective print; Weight: 8.6 ounces; Continental™ Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Matte Silver / Solar Red; Product code: GY6113
colors: Core Black / Matte Silver / Solar Red

description:
Seize control. These juniors' adidas running shoes help you take charge, whether you're out for a training run or going for a personal record. The BOOST midsole delivers endless energy return, while a stiffer forefoot ensures forward propulsion and an efficient stride. The Stretchweb outsole flexes naturally for a comfortable ride, and Continental™ Rubber gives you traction on wet and dry surfaces.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
